snippet.title: The Wreck - Teaser trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist the game on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1687960/The_Wreck/
Follow failed screenwriter Junon as she attempts to make it through the most pivotal day in her life. Relive the past, alter the present, and embrace the future - or watch Junon’s story end in a wreck.

A game by The Pixel Hunt, co-funded by Kowloon Nights, with the help of Media Creative Europe, CNC FAJV and La Région Île-de-France.
